message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its features and benefits. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $15000 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $18000. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $16500. How about we meet at $17000? That's the lowest I can go for now.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $16000?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $16250? That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $15500?

I can see you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $14500?
